reports_summary: One tester notes that Titanfall 2 feels smooth on the Lenovo Legion Go at high settings with 800p integer scaling, delivering mid‑40s FPS under a 48 FPS cap; the session was stable and responsive, consuming about 30 W for roughly 1 hour 40 minutes of battery life, and the report rated the session highly. Dropping one or two heavier visual options or easing the cap will extend runtime with little loss in feel.
